words.example: I work for a big company.

We live in a modern society.
I can offer you a discount.
He's an authority on the subject.
The room has a capacity of 100.
What category does it fall into?
He attributes his success to hard work.
We need to determine the cause.
I want to emphasize this point.
We need to alleviate the problem.
This is an aberration from normal.
He was admonished for his behavior.
She has an affinity for art.
His view is the antithesis of mine.
We need to ascertain the facts.
Brevity is the soul of wit.
